title.narrative: GOVERNANCE AND SYSTEMS

description.narrative: Effective and efficient Governance and Systems, which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Effective and efficient programme management and operations support to programme delivery.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Effective and efficient Governance and Systems

description.narrative: CO Governance functioned as expected, committees were established and met regularly. KPIs were monthly monitored. CO encouraged staff to use One Drive. ICT plan to renew IT equipment was approved and executed. UNICEF Global Projects, Veeam Backup and replication v9, in which CO was Pilot Office, was implemented | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2017

title.narrative: % of Office Management Committees fully functioning as per ToRs established.
ICT systems efficiently managed according to UNICEF guidelines, policies and standards and VISION requirements.
